about_the_game:
Step into a dark, post-apocalyptic fantasy world where chaos reigns and the underworld mages wage a brutal war for dominance. Defend the last bastions of civilization in a desperate struggle for survival. Wishlist now and DEMO coming soon!

Play as a variety of powerful imperial archmages, giving orders by directly interacting with structures and units as you run through your crumbling base. Fight, build, and strategize up close as waves of enemy hordes threaten your survival. Every decision is personal - every moment is a battle for survival.

Manage your resources and strike a balance between offense and defense! While mages, soldiers, and heroes are crucial to defending your strongholds, harvesting resources is just as important to support them and build new structures.

Each level features unique, carefully handcrafted visuals from Gothic cathedrals and Persian bazaars to Asian temples, Aztec ruins, and the lost civilizations of Atlantis and beyond.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K or AMD Ryzen™ 1300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 (3GB) or ATI Radeon™ RX 470
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Solid State Storage is recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-10500 or AMD™ Ryzen 5 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 2060 or ATI Radeon™ RX 5600XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Solid State Storage is recommended

short_description: Defend your imperial cities against the invasion of underworld mages! Rally survivors, mages and soldiers, strengthen your defenses and fight for survival in this epic tower defense fantasy.
